      • Server

        public Server(int p,
              int max,
              int pl,
              int m)
        Basic constructor for starting a server
        Parameters:
        p - the port of the server
        max - the max amount of people that can ever join the server
        pl - the amount of player that can join the server
        m - the gamemode of the server
